name: shackstats
description: Statistics for the Shacknews chatty forum
author: Brian Luft

scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules/ built/ web/ext/*.js && (find web/data/ -name "*.csv" -print0 | xargs -0 rm)
scripts.prepublish: tsc && cp -f node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js web/ext/ && cp -f node_modules/papaparse/papaparse.min.js web/ext/ && cp -f node_modules/chart.js/dist/Chart.min.js web/ext/ && cp -f node_modules/moment/min/moment.min.js web/ext/
